object_size_estimation: Given an object, identify the size of the object and output the specific value.For such problems, only objects with a quantity of 1 can be selected among the objects involved in the problem.
object_size_comparison: Given multiple objects, compare their sizes.For such problems, only objects with a quantity of 1 can be selected among the objects involved in the problem.
object_volume_estimation: Identify the volume of the object and output the corresponding value. For such problems, only objects with a quantity of 1 can be selected among the objects involved in the problem. Therefore, the problems raised are all volume estimates for a single object.
object_volume_comparison: Compare the volume sizes of multiple objects in the video to find the largest or smallest one. For such problems, only objects with a quantity of 1 can be selected among the objects involved in the problem.
object_below: Determine whether one object is positioned at a lower elevation relative to the other.For such problems, only objects with a quantity of 1 can be selected among the objects involved in the problem
object_above: Assess the relative vertical positions of two objects to establish whether one is positioned above the other.For such problems, only objects with a quantity of 1 can be selected among the objects involved in the problem.
object_direction_facing_complex: Given three objects, after determining the perspective through two of them, determine the relative position of the other object in the video.Relative position includes front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right. For such problems, only objects with a quantity of 1 can be selected among the objects involved in the problem. Additionally, it is necessary to indicate in the problem from which object the viewing Angle points to which object.
object_direction_facing_simple: Given three objects, after determining the perspective through two of them, determine the relative position of the other object in the video.Relative position includes left, right. For such problems, only objects with a quantity of 1 can be selected among the objects involved in the problem. Additionally, it is necessary to indicate in the problem from which object the viewing Angle points to which object.
object_abs_distance: Calculate the absolute distance between two objects in the video. For such problems, only objects with a quantity of 1 can be selected among the objects involved in the problem.
object_rel_distance: Determine which of the candidate objects is the closest to the target object. For such problems, only objects with a quantity of 1 can be selected among the objects involved in the problem.
object_nearby: What objects are there within a certain range near the object.For such problems, only objects with a quantity of 1 can be selected among the objects involved in the problem
object_counting: Count the total number of times a certain type of object appears in the video and output this value. For this type of problem, there is no limit to the number of objects involved in the problem. Questions are raised regarding the types of objects in this type of object.
High_and_low_position: Given two objects, assess their relative vertical positions to identify which one is at a higher elevation.For such problems, only objects with a quantity of 1 can be selected among the objects involved in the problem
object_in_same: Given multiple objects, determine whether two of them are in the field of view.For such problems, only objects with a quantity of 1 can be selected among the objects involved in the problem
